arts.ttl: Gladbach gain comfortable victory over struggling Bochum
arts.sum: Tim Kleindienst got a goal and an assist as Borussia Mönchengladbach secured their first win of 2025 in convincing style against bottom-of-the-table Bochum. Rocco Reitz completed a wonderful corner routine for Gladbach's first goal.
Gladbach ended a three-match winless run with a comfortable 3-0 home victory over Bochum.

Gladbach have lost their first three outings in 2025 and have conceded a penalty in each of their last four games. Despite trailing 3-0 at half-time, bottom club Bochum proved their reknowned fightin...

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs Bochum preview: Out of Form Gladbach Look to Reset Form
arts.sum: Out of form Borussia Mönchengladbach will continue their hunt for a first Bundesliga victory of 2025 as they welcome relegation-threatened VfL Bochum to Borussia-Park for their gameweek 19 clash.

arts.ttl: Börussia Monchengladbach working on deal to bring Montpellier’s Arnaud Nordin to the club
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that Borussia Mönchengladbach are working on bringing Montpellier winger Arnaud Nordin to the club this month. After a move for former Heidenheim midfielder Jan-Niklas Beste was deemed unlikely…

arts.ttl: Kaiserslautern pick up attackers Grant-Leon Ranos and Faride Alidou
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach confirmed a loan out for young Armenian attacker Grant-Leon Ranos late Wednesday. Ranos' new second division side, 1. FC Kaiserslautern, then confirmed a pick up of another player from a Bundesliga club on Thursday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Monchengladbach vs. VfL Bochum - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Monchengladbach and VfL Bochum, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
